general:
This screen allows you to enter the information for creating your publication.

On this page, you can:

  • Click on next to the item you want to enter or update a piece of information,
  • Click the Preview button above to see how this page will look to the public with your changes so far, or
  • Click on the Save button above to save the changes to your draft and come back to this later.

Click to the right of each field to edit

title.label: Title
title.general:
The title should be written in plain language and include sufficient detail to facilitate search and discovery.

If this publication can be considered a supplement to a literature publication, consider using the same title with an extra annotation, like ': Supplementary Data'.
title.edit: Type the title into the input box and then click the icon to save.

authors.label: Authors
authors.general: This section should list all authors or collaborators whose work falls under one of the 14 roles listed in the Credit Contributor Roles Taxonomy. Add affiliations and ORCIDs as available.
authors.list: Click to add authors. Click to make edits.
authors.edit:
Click to save changes.

[Helpful examples, links to policy and guidance]
authors.dragdrop: To change the order of authors listed, click on on the left of each name, drag it to the right place in the list, and release the mouse button to drop it in place.

contactPoint.label: Contact Point
contactPoint.general: Review the name of the NIST contact listed who will respond to questions about this resource. To edit this contact, click
contactPoint.edit:
Click to save changes.

[Helpful examples, links to policy and guideance]

landingPage.label: Visit Home Page
landingPage.general:
The Home Page is the users' entry point for a resource. It provides contextual information and access to the resource itself (i.e. download links for data). Importantly, the DOI (digital object identifier) will point to this URL.

If you wish for this NIST Public Data Repository page to your Home Page, leave this box blank and click to close the entry field. If you would like to point to another home page enter the URL here.
landingPage.edit:
Enter a working URL for a homepage other than this repository landing page. Click to save changes

[Helpful examples, links to policy and guideance]

description.label: Description
description.general: This field is for a human-readable description of your resource that will enable a user to quickly identify whether it is of interest. You may wish to use part of the abstract of a related publication. Avoid copying the entire abstract if the entirety is not relevant to this discrete resource.
description.edit:
Click to save.

[Helpful examples, links to policy and guidance]

theme.label: Research Topics
theme.general: You are in Research Topics section where you can select topics from the NIST Research Taxonomy. Select one or more topics that apply to this resource
theme.add:
Click to select topics for this resource. Click on the arrows to view subtopics. Double-click on a topic to select it for your resource.Â 

[Helpful examples, links to policy and guideance]
theme.edit:
To edit your Research Topics selections, click on . Double click on topics to add them. Click to the right of topics to delete them.

[Helpful examples, links to policy and guideance]

keyword.label: Keywords
keyword.general: Add keywords, or subject terms that help both technical and non-technical users to discover this resource. Separate the terms with commas. You may enter up to a maximum of 4,000 characters
keyword.add:
Click to save.

[Helpful examples, links to policy and guidance]
keyword.edit:
Click to edit your keywords or enter additional keywords. Separate the terms with commas.

[Helpful examples, links to policy and guidance]

components.label: Access Page
components.general: You are in the Data Access section. Enter URLs for sites with related information on this resource, e.g. a GitHub repository. Each entry requires the URL, the 'Link text' or Title, and information 'About this link' or a description. Note: this area is not for links to files. To upload and link files use the 'Files' button below.
components.list: Click to enter URLs to sites with information related to this resource. Click to make edits.
components.add:
Separate each URL with a comma. When all URLS are entered, click to save.

[Helpful examples, links to policy and guideance]
components.edit: Separate each URL with a comma. When all URLS are entered, click to save.
components.dragdrop: To change the order of URLs listed, click on on the left of each link, drag it to the right place in the list, and release the mouse button to drop it in place.

references.label: References
references.general:
You are in References section where you can add references or citations related to this resource. You may wish to include links to multiple types of resources such as a related publication or a software package.

[Other Helpful examples, links to policy and guidance]
references.list: Click to add the URI of a related resource. Click to make changes to existing References listed here.
references.add:
Separate each Reference URL with a comma. When all References are entered, click to save.

[Helpful examples, links to policy and guidance]
references.edit:
Separate each Reference URL with a comma. When all References are entered, click to save.

[Helpful examples, links to policy and guidance]
references.dragdrop:
To change the order of references listed, click on on the left of each reference, drag it to the right place in the list, and release the mouse button to drop it in place.

[Helpful examples, links to policy and guidance]
